title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does nothing. The expected behavior is either the menu should be removed or, preferably, the action should add the Javadoc to the selected field.
EB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, the Javadoc should be added to the selected field.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 
2. Select a field in the view.
